title: About the c2d file format
text: Technically, .c2d files gzip-compressed XML text files Cyclus2-specific content. Let‚Äôs take tour ‚Äúidealized‚Äù .c2d file get overview structure content data. rough XML structure inside .c2d file follows: Inside C2D node, 3 main nodes, System, Program, Training: System contains information athlete, bike settings, environment. Program contains information Cyclus2 program. Training contains data training session, including date, header, row data time point.

title: About the c2d file format
text: System node contains information athlete, bike settings, environment.

title: About the c2d file format
text: Athlete node contains information athlete, see manual, section ‚Äú6.1. Athlete data‚Äù. user-entered Cyclus2 menu item System > Athlete Settings. example Athlete node. meanings fields: Firstname: String first name. Name: String family name. Sex: Numeric code sex; value 1 ‚Äúmale‚Äù? FIXME: Check possible values. DoB: Date birth, format ‚ÄúMM/DD/YYYY 12:00:00 ‚Äù. Area: Drag Area square meters (m¬≤), see manual. Weight: Weight kilograms (kg). Height: Height meters (m). Cw: Drag coefficient, see manual. tp: Obsolete; used encrypted credentials online training platforms company TrainingPeaks, LLC.

title: About the c2d file format
text: CycleData node contains information bike settings. bike parameters user-entered Cyclus2 menu item System > Bike Settings. (Note units may different, e.g., Crank Length entered millimeters, saved meters inside crank field). bike parameters must accurately correspond actual, physical bike used ergometry, enter calculations values pedal force, cadence, speed, inclination cycled distance. example CycleData node; contain numeric values. meanings, though still seem slightly unclear. crank: crank length, meters (m). perim: wheel perimeter/circumference, meters (m). weight: bike weight, kilograms (kg). front: number teeth physical/real front chain ring. rear: number teeth physical/real rear sprocket. vfront: FIXME: Unclear? Probably number teeth virtual front chainring, virtual gear settings. vrear: FIXME: Unclear? Probably number teeth virtual rear sprocket, virtual gear settings.

title: About the c2d file format
text: Field node contains information environment, see manual, section ‚Äú6.3. Environmental conditions‚Äù. user-entered Cyclus2 menu item System > External Conditions. example Field node; contain numeric values. meanings: AirDens: Air density, kilograms per cubic meter (kg/m¬≥), see manual. FricIdx: Friction index, important track simulation, see manual.

title: Parse C2D File Format From Cyclus2 Ergometers
text: Working Cyclus2 data native .c2d file format many advantages derived, exported formats: .c2d files include information, e.g., bike settings impossible export. Depending export settings, exported files may lack data (later) interest, may lack numerical precision. Simpler procedure: need save data twice, export analysis .c2d archiving. Interoperability: Even single lab, agreeing export format take time effort, change may make previously exported data incompatible. contrast, .c2d files remain , even across labs, thus analysis scripts remain compatible.
